set-outer-border-none.label: t__No borders
set-outer-border-none.description: t__Don't draw any outer borders on the selected table.

set-outer-border-all.label: t__All borders
set-outer-border-all.description: t__Draw borders on all outer edges of the selected table.

set-outer-border-bottom.label: t__Bottom
set-outer-border-bottom.description: t__Draw a border on the outer bottom edge of the selected table.

set-outer-border-top.label: t__Top
set-outer-border-top.description: t__Draw a border on the outer top edge of the selected table.

set-outer-border-sides.label: t__Sides
set-outer-border-sides.description: t__Draw a border on the left and right outer edges of the selected table.

set-outer-border-topbot.label: t__Top and bottom
set-outer-border-topbot.description: t__Draw a border on the top and bottom outer edges of the selected table.
